name: CaveHart
description:
Made for GMTK jam 2018. Our theme is: Dating-Sim without dialogue. Lead Hart on a quest to woo the 5 vivacious ladies, Brot, Ima, Kro, Roca, and Shesho. Draw cave-paintings to impresses the ladies by discovering their passions and unlock their hearts through art! 

Controls:

ASWD to move

f to give paintings

return to the cave to draw more paintings

DEV NOTES:

The game was not completed in time. The algorithm for determining the drawing created matches a a favorite item of a love interest was not completed bug fixing. Among some other bugs that were not addressed in time. The project was a bit ambitious and scope creep was a challenge but we all learned a lot and look forward to the next game jam!

Created by:

Kristi - Artist/Concept

Alan - Programmer/Developer

Drew - Designer/Developer

Tyler  - Algorithm Programming

Brit - Audio and cave drawings
